公共卫生策略敦促在中国打击早期发作的2型糖尿病由北京大学研究人员领导的一项新研究，在健康数据科学上发表，揭示了1990年至2021年中国青少年和中国青少年的早期发作2型糖尿病（T2D）的负担急剧上升。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250206/public-health-strategies-rate-to-combat-early-early-onset-type-2-diape-2-diabetes-in-china.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250206/public-health-strategies-rate-to-to-combat-early-early-set-type-type-2-diabetes-2 diabetes-in-china.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6A39F975-8613-4E46-84B8-7873134E6B51 Thu, 06 Feb 2025 01:06:00 -0500 Public health strategies urged to combat early-onset type 2 diabetes in China

科学家警告致命阈值，地球正在超越人类极限随着全球温度的升高，越来越多的地区正在经历超过人体冷却能力的热量水平。科学家揭示了创纪录的热浪如何推动过生存阈值，从而使紧急的气候行动和适应至关重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250205/earth-is-heating-beyond-human-liman-limits-scientists-scientists-warn of Deadly-Thresholds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250205/earth-is-heating-beyond-human-liman-limits-scientists-scientists-scientists-feadly-thersholds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5B358674-1EDE-449B-8272-10185B6444773 Wed, 05 Feb 2025 22:52:00 -0500 Earth is heating beyond human limits, scientists warn of deadly thresholds
